code: import{API_BASE_URL}from"./config";const base=API_BASE_URL||"";export async function getUsers(){const res=await fetch("".concat(base,"/api/users"));if(!res.ok)throw new Error("API error: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}export async function createUser(data){const res=await fetch("".concat(base,"/api/users"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!res.ok){const errText=await res.text();throw new Error(errText||"API error: ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();}
